name: European Federation for Company Sport
goal:
The European Federation for Company Sport is a voluntary non-profit organization. EFCS main objective is to promote and develop sport practice in the professional environment all across Europe. It groups European national federations for company sport from all over Europe. Most of these federations’ members are companies which differ in their size, form, and activity.

CORE MISSIONS
• Strengthening human and cultural contacts accross national borderes through sport
• Promoting regular physical activity within companies
• Emphasizing the recreational and health enhancing character of grassroots sport
euInitiatives:
Leader Active Workplace Healthy Lifestyle Erasmus + project European Meetings of Company Sport Erasmus + project Workplace Active Certicification + Projet Healthy Employee Mobile and Active
Partner of Erasmus + projects (SWInG, PACTE)
Member of EWoS Advisory Board and EWoS partner
Collaboration with Sport Unit, EACEA and EU Commission regarding sport issues
Official partner of Healthy Workplaces Campaign
